Name: Oversized Serialized Data Payloads
Description: An adversary injects oversized serialized data payloads into a parser during data processing to produce adverse effects upon the parser such as exhausting system resources and arbitrary code execution.
Mitigations: ::Carefully validate and sanitize all user-controllable serialized data prior to passing it to the parser routine. Ensure that the resultant data is safe to pass to the parser.::Perform validation on canonical data.::Pick a robust implementation of the serialized data parser.::Validate data against a valid schema or DTD prior to parsing.::
